motto: Proactive Computer Science Engineering student skilled in Data Structures, Algorithms, Cybersecurity, and API Testing, proficient in Java, Python, and C/C++. Engaged in significant voluntary leadership roles as an Innovation Ambassador and Events Team Lead, complementing a solid academic record and hands-on project experience.

biography.title: Hello, I'm Puskar Saha
paragraphs: I'm a proactive Computer Science Engineering student with a strong foundation in Data Structures and Algorithms. I have a passion for cybersecurity and API testing, and I am proficient in Java, Python, and C/C++.

In addition to my academic record, I have held significant voluntary leadership roles as an Innovation Ambassador and Events Team Lead. I am always working to improve my web development skills and explore new technologies.
